code: import React,{Component}from'react';import formatDistanceToNow from'date-fns/formatDistanceToNow';import'./Task.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default class Task extends Component{render(){const{id,description,created,done,edit}=this.props;const dateDistance=formatDistanceToNow(new Date(created),{includeSeconds:true});let className;done?className="completed":className="";className+=edit;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:className,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"view",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"toggle",type:"checkbox",onClick:this.props.onDoneClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"description",children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"created",children:dateDistance})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"icon icon-edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"icon icon-destroy",onClick:this.props.onDestroy})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"edit",value:"Editing task"})]},id);}}Task.defaultProps={onDestroy:()=>{},onDoneClick:()=>{}};;
